name: Center Aim
description:
Center Aim was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. In Center Aim you have to make a turret shoot the enemies while you have to keep avoiding them, turret's aiming is connected to the player's position.

Made in 24 hours only, instead of 48.

How to Play : 

- WASD/up,down,right,left arrows to move

- Left click for the turret to shoot

Your objective :

 Avoid the incoming enemies waves and get the highest score possible! be careful since your location is jointed to the turret's aim this means that you will have to get near the enemies if you want them dead!
